products.description: Enterprise-grade version of SurveyMonkey with admin controls, compliance, and collaboration features for organization-wide feedback programs.
products.primary_use: Collect, analyze, and act on feedback securely across teams and departments.
sample_use_cases: A hospital system runs patient and staff feedback programs securely.
A global company conducts employee engagement surveys across 20 countries.
A university manages course and instructor evaluations.
upsell_opportunities: SurveyMonkey Audience – for external respondent sourcing.
GetFeedback Direct – for transactional CX feedback.
MRX Solutions – for advanced brand or market research support.

products.description: On-demand marketplace of millions of vetted respondents for fast, targeted research across demographics and geographies.
products.primary_use: Gather market and consumer insights from non-customers or general audiences.
sample_use_cases: A healthcare company surveys nurses nationwide about product preferences.
A CPG brand tests new packaging concepts with 1,000 U.S. consumers.
A SaaS company validates new feature ideas with tech professionals.
upsell_opportunities: MRX Solutions – for expert-led survey design and data analysis.
SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for centralized data and reporting across teams.

products.description: Full-service research programs combining SurveyMonkey's technology with professional research expertise for end-to-end studies.
products.primary_use: Execute large or complex research studies with expert design, sampling, and analysis.
sample_use_cases: A pharma company tracks brand awareness and prescribing intent among doctors.
A bank commissions an annual customer satisfaction benchmark study.
A retail brand conducts multi-country brand lift analysis.
upsell_opportunities: MRX Audience – for specialized B2B and healthcare panels.
SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for in-house follow-up studies or pulse checks.

products.description: Specialized respondent panels designed for advanced research — including B2B decision-makers, medical professionals, and niche populations.
products.primary_use: Reach high-value, hard-to-access respondents for business or medical research.
sample_use_cases: A medical device firm collects feedback from cardiologists.
A B2B SaaS platform surveys CTOs about procurement behavior.
A consulting firm gathers competitive intelligence from SMB owners.
upsell_opportunities: MRX Solutions – for full research study execution.
SurveyMonkey Audience – for consumer comparison or mixed panels.

products.description: Real-time digital experience tool to capture feedback across websites and mobile apps, part of the GetFeedback CX suite.
products.primary_use: Improve website and app experiences through contextual, in-the-moment feedback.
sample_use_cases: A hospital collects patient feedback on its online appointment booking journey.
An e-commerce brand identifies user pain points on the checkout page.
A SaaS company measures satisfaction after onboarding completion.
upsell_opportunities: GetFeedback Direct – to capture post-transaction or post-support feedback.
SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for broader organizational feedback management.

products.description: A simple drag-and-drop form builder for collecting information, payments, and registrations without coding.
products.primary_use: Quickly collect structured data and integrate with websites or CRM tools.
sample_use_cases: A clinic uses Wufoo to collect patient intake forms online.
A nonprofit sets up event registration with donation payments.
A small business builds a contact form for customer inquiries.
upsell_opportunities: SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for analytics and advanced reporting.
SM Apply – for structured application or submission processes.

products.description: Platform for managing end-to-end application and review workflows for programs like scholarships, awards, or grants.
products.primary_use: Simplify collection, review, and decision-making for multi-stage application processes.
sample_use_cases: A university manages thousands of scholarship applications each year.
A healthcare foundation handles research grant submissions.
A corporate CSR team evaluates innovation challenge entries.
upsell_opportunities: SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for follow-up surveys to applicants or reviewers.
Wufoo – for simpler, public-facing lead capture forms.

products.description: A white-label version of SurveyMonkey, used by professional researchers or organizations needing a neutral domain and branding.
products.primary_use: Run research surveys under an independent, neutral domain for credibility or privacy.
sample_use_cases: A medical university publishes a peer-reviewed research study survey.
A healthcare organization runs confidential patient satisfaction surveys.
A consulting firm conducts client research under a non-branded URL.
upsell_opportunities: SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for secure internal survey management.
MRX Solutions – for professional design and analysis of complex studies.

products.description: Transactional feedback tool that captures customer experiences immediately after key interactions via email, SMS, or app triggers.
products.primary_use: Collect and act on real-time feedback from key touchpoints in the customer journey.
sample_use_cases: A hospital sends post-discharge surveys to patients via SMS.
A bank measures satisfaction after digital account opening.
A software company triggers support ticket follow-up surveys automatically.
upsell_opportunities: GetFeedback Digital – to collect website or in-app feedback.
SurveyMonkey Enterprise – for broader organizational survey programs.
